00035 #ifndef _LUSTRE_OBDO_H_
00036 #define _LUSTRE_OBDO_H_
00037 
00038 #include <lustre/lustre_idl.h>
00039 
00043 void dump_obdo(struct obdo *oa);
00044 
00048 static inline void lustre_set_wire_obdo(const struct obd_connect_data *ocd,
00049                                         struct obdo *wobdo,
00050                                         const struct obdo *lobdo)
00051 {
00052         *wobdo = *lobdo;
00053         wobdo->o_flags &= ~OBD_FL_LOCAL_MASK;
00054         if (ocd == NULL)
00055                 return;
00056 
00057         if (unlikely(!(ocd->ocd_connect_flags & OBD_CONNECT_FID)) &&
00058             fid_seq_is_echo(ostid_seq(&lobdo->o_oi))) {
00059                 /* Currently OBD_FL_OSTID will only be used when 2.4 echo
00060                  * client communicate with pre-2.4 server */
00061                 wobdo->o_oi.oi.oi_id = fid_oid(&lobdo->o_oi.oi_fid);
00062                 wobdo->o_oi.oi.oi_seq = fid_seq(&lobdo->o_oi.oi_fid);
00063         }
00064 }
00065 
00069 static inline void lustre_get_wire_obdo(const struct obd_connect_data *ocd,
00070                                         struct obdo *lobdo,
00071                                         const struct obdo *wobdo)
00072 {
00073         __u32 local_flags = 0;
00074 
00075         if (lobdo->o_valid & OBD_MD_FLFLAGS)
00076                 local_flags = lobdo->o_flags & OBD_FL_LOCAL_MASK;
00077 
00078         *lobdo = *wobdo;
00079         if (local_flags != 0) {
00080                 lobdo->o_valid |= OBD_MD_FLFLAGS;
00081                 lobdo->o_flags &= ~OBD_FL_LOCAL_MASK;
00082                 lobdo->o_flags |= local_flags;
00083         }
00084         if (ocd == NULL)
00085                 return;
00086 
00087         if (unlikely(!(ocd->ocd_connect_flags & OBD_CONNECT_FID)) &&
00088             fid_seq_is_echo(wobdo->o_oi.oi.oi_seq)) {
00089                 /* see above */
00090                 lobdo->o_oi.oi_fid.f_seq = wobdo->o_oi.oi.oi_seq;
00091                 lobdo->o_oi.oi_fid.f_oid = wobdo->o_oi.oi.oi_id;
00092                 lobdo->o_oi.oi_fid.f_ver = 0;
00093         }
00094 }
00095 
00096 #endif
